rules_text:
Flying, first strike
When Sfren deals combat damage to a creature, if that creature would die this turn, return it to the battlefield under your control.
When Sfren deals combat damage to a player, exile target instant or sorcery card from their graveyard, you may cast that card without paying its mana costs.
{U}{B}{R}: Transform Sfren. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
rules_text2:
When a opponent casts their first spell each turn, you may copy it. If you do, you may choose new targets for that copy and that opponent draws two cards and creates two Treasure tokens.
{BR}{UR}:Transform Tomb of Tyrants. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
